sn2.2:1.2: Standing to one side, the young deva Kassapa recited this verse in the presence of the Blessed One:
sn2.2:2.2: One who is liberated in mind, If he desires the heart’s attainment,
sn2.2:2.3: Having known the world’s rise and fall,
sn2.2:2.4: Let him be lofty in mind and unattached, bent on that as his advantage.”
